name: bang.html
description: BANG! Web Component custom elements with async templating, smooth syntax and self-closing tags!

scripts.test: watch cp src/bang.js docs/bang-dev.js & serve -p 8080 docs/
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo 'npm run pack' not ready yet
scripts.pack: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp src/style.css dist/style.css && npx roadroller src/bang.js -o dist/bang.js

author: @dosy
